info.name: UDEMY FULL DARK THEME
info.description: New dark styles for UDEMY Chrome Extension: https://bit.ly/2zcr4XZ Author: Dawid Pachciarek
info.additionalInfo:
Version: 1.2
- styles for tests 
- repair ".browse-full-width-container"
- new styles for udlite
- and more..
